Package com.example.blackbox.tag

package com.example.blackbox.tag
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.blackbox
     
  • Class
    Description
    ColorSpinnerAdapter
    The `ColorSpinnerAdapter` class is a custom ArrayAdapter used to populate a Spinner with TagColor objects, representing colors.
    Tag
    This class represents a tag which can be applied to an item for the purposes of sorting and filtering Tags contain data such as name, databaseID, color, and description, and provide methods for updating or retrieving data.
    TagAdapter
    A custom ArrayAdapter for populating an inventory list view with Item objects.
    TagAddEditFragment
    The fragment responsible for handling user data input related to the creation or editing of tags.
    TagAddFragment
    A fragment responsible for adding tags
    TagColor
    This class represents an object which is displayed by a ColorSpinnerAdapter specifically these represent colors that can be chosen for tags
    TagDB
    Handles interactions with the Firestore database for managing inventory items.
    TagDB.OnGetTagsCallback
    An interface which calling classes can implement in order to execute code upon the completion of the getAllTagsTask
    TagEditFragment
    A fragment responsible for editing tags
    TagFragment
    A fragment responsible for viewing, editing, and adding tags
